entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
